mapper.select: SELECT a.name as tableName, b.rows as tableRows FROM sysobjects AS a INNER JOIN sysindexes AS b ON a.id = b.id WHERE (a.type = 'u') AND (b.indid IN (0, 1)) ORDER BY a.name,b.rows DESC
Select Name as fieldName, type_name(xusertype) as filedType, length as filedLength FROM SysColumns Where id=Object_Id(#{tableName})
